snippet: Serena Williams has withdrawn from the Wuhan and China Opens due to a persistent shoulder injury and is targeting a return to action in next month's WTA Finals in Singapore, the world number two said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams has withdrawn from the Wuhan and China Opens due to a persistent shoulder injury and is targeting a return to action in next month's WTA Finals in Singapore, the world number two said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Injured Serena Pulls Out of Wuhan, China Opens
headline.main: Injured Serena Pulls Out of Wuhan, China Opens
